FuncDef:
The qx server all-interface disable command sets the QX service only run on NeIP and DCN Access IP.
The undo qx server all-interface disable command restores the default configuration.
By default, the QX service run on all local IP addresses.
Examples: Warning: The QX protocol will be run on all interface, which is not safe. Running the qx server all-interface disable command to run it only on NeIP and DCN access interfaces is recommended.
